documents.document: The @berlinmarathon is my favourite event so far. What an amazing experience. This made it so special #bibchat https://t.co/K2m8kCAGsI

@thehungryrunner @BibRave @ChiMarathon @RunRocknRoll Yeah! I want a Heavy Medal lol #bibchat
@BibRave A6 I am eyeing the @ChiMarathon and another @RunRocknRoll race somewhere. Lots of training ahead #bibchat
@ErinTtweeting @BibRave For sure!! It makes such a huge difference #bibchat
@carlaxelfranzon @BibRave Yes and homemade signs! But I need to come up with something witty #bibchat
@BibRave A5 volunteer and cheer at races! That's the best way to give back. #bibchat
@Chris_C_Roberts @BibRave It's never been a part of my routine so I can try that to start. Thanks! #bibchat
@BibRave A4 yes! I collect trophies on @GarminFitness Connect and also have it saved on @Strava - helps to know where the segments are #bibchat
@Chris_C_Roberts @BibRave How long should I do a wall sit? #bibchat
@AlliJCollister @BibRave Awesome! I'm excited to see results. #bibchat
@kateandmrt @BibRave My butt will thank me later lol #bibchat
@BibRave A3 trying to incorporate more strength training in my routine, which means I need to do some squats when I get home 😆#bibchat
@iRunOnBeer @BibRave I was so hooked on it #bibchat
@BibRave A2 they're important because it shows if I'm improving or not. It's hard to gauge while training, the real results are on race days #bibchat
@ErinTtweeting @BibRave Super comfy
@BibRave A1 I started 3 years ago and my first race was the @wwwTRYEVENTSca #chillychase 10k and I completely bonked lol #bibchat
@BibRave Hi! Jeannine here from Vancouver, I loved Tom and Jerry when I was a kid! #bibchat https://t.co/0h017Wd855
Those dots represent @RunGoApp routes available in the lower mainland. Which route will you explore today? #bibchat https://t.co/FFTdxr5XE3 https://t.co/rI8rNxLx4J
3 more weeks until I get to run the #stripatnight at @RunRocknRoll #RnRVegas 😁Sign up & use the code below #bibchat https://t.co/S87H6RTptL https://t.co/l7CR9kMMfB
The @SeawallRace was a success! Almost a thousand finishers braved the cold & rain. Here's my recap #bibchat https://t.co/txqnZjOTJ1 https://t.co/XNuET3bp37
@tmurph135 @SeawallRace Full gas at this point... with the finish just meters away. 👍#bibchat #orangeisthenewfast
ICYMI my race recap of the @SeawallRace is now up on the blog. I had a blast even in the cold & rain. #bibchat https://t.co/grXfwEzd6V https://t.co/v1mpwvV9b4

@LGRoadRunners @SeawallRace @bjcjapan @Ohgord @BibRave @StanleyParkVan Thanks again for having us. I'll try for #GunnerShaw - waiting to see if I'm free or not!

@Ohgord @SeawallRace @bjcjapan @BibRave Thanks! I can't wait to see your outfit 😆 When's your next race?

Back to long run Sundays, preparing for @RunRocknRoll #RnRVegas in just a few weeks. Need to get the distance back up #bibchat #StripatNight https://t.co/AsroxradCI
Great seeing you today @Ohgord ! Thanks for the blog mention 😀 awesome recap and I did enjoy your pirate puns! https://t.co/7w9BBMs7hH

Thank goodness for warm hoodies and fleece pants. That's a wrap for the @SeawallRace - time to lie on the couch. #seawallrace #bibchat https://t.co/lHWxdYXSsN
The @SeawallRace costume contest was so fun! Seeing them along the #seawallrace really enhanced my race experience #bibchat #bibravepro https://t.co/3vbTYkhUiH
The @SeawallRace was a blast! What a turnout! Managed to run a 10k PB pace and felt strong. Thanks for a great event. #bibchat #seawallrace https://t.co/HqWQeW4U0h
Met up with @bjcjapan (my @BocoGear hat twin!) and found shelter until it was time to run the @SeawallRace #bibchat #seawallrace #bocogear https://t.co/ogxdTrqHOc
It was a wet day for the @SeawallRace but after some ☕️ it was time to rock the @BibRave orange & face the elements. #seawallrace #bibchat https://t.co/gsjRg7eFNE
Are you ready for #raceday ? The @SeawallRace starts at 10AM tomorrow so get there early. See you on the seawall #bibchat #seawallrace https://t.co/F3SLnZ8Ik4
@LGRoadRunners @SeawallRace I'll try!!! I've been meaning to sign up but not sure if I'm free this year.

Running #theghostrace is more fun with friends, esp when it's raining. Saved the route on @RunGoApp too if you want to check it out #bibchat https://t.co/h0cP1Rv70v
See you bright and early on Saturday at the 47th annual @SeawallRace - sign up by midnight to get in! #bibchat https://t.co/kP94qqxJFp
@FunRunBox @BibRave Me too, I'm a weak swimmer but some people can just go on and on #bibchat
RT @BibRave: Didn’t win some @FunRunBox boxes? Save 15% off any subscription or single Oktoberfest box w/code "BIBRAVE"! https://t.co/GD53r…
@BibRave A6 Running=exploration - I don't like being cooped up in a gym, but I do like swimming laps in a pool. That gets boring too tho #bibchat
@FunRunBox @BibRave @RunRocknRoll For sure! Do you ship to Canada? Or have plans to? #bibchat
@BibRave A5 The @parismarathon - I would work it out so that the race is halfway into my vacation to get over jet lag. #bibchat
@DaJediMaster @BibRave @RunRocknRoll Nope it's still on but with some minor changes :) #bibchat
@BibRave A4 I am looking forward to @RunRocknRoll #RnRVegas post-race experience. Well, also the before and during the race experiences. 🤘#bibchat
@Jmonst @BibRave Bathroom selfies FTW :P #bibchat
@BibRave A4 The Sunset Festival at @SeaWheeze is a blast but as long as there's good post-race food on hand & friends, that's all I need. #bibchat
@ErinTtweeting @BibRave @HotChocolate15k For sure! #irunforcandy #bibchat
@Jmonst @BibRave Hey to you too! Sorry I'm late lol #bibchat
@BibRave A1 Functionality and cool factor... if it works and is worth the money, I have no problem paying for it. #bibchat
@BibRave A2 The @HotChocolate15k races are awesome... anytime there are marshmallows on the course is always 👌#bibchat
@BibRave A3 Trail races! I'm looking to up my game and explore at the same time 😄#bibchat
@BibRave Omg I'm so late! Jeannine from Vancouver here and I can't resist little Snickers bites! #bibchat https://t.co/ytOhW48CSS
Hey @LGRoadRunners ! I signed up for the #GunnerShawRace 5k! See you there!
My first taste of the Foretrails Race Series - I ran the Hallow's Eve 10k race and volunteered for the Phantom... https://t.co/1fGXJbwAZM
I just signed up for @Squamish50 23k and apparently there are only a few spots left. Get in there quickly! It's mind-blowing how fast it's selling out this year. https://t.co/pGmugQTQIa

Rainfall warning? Pfft... we laced them up anyway and went for a strong speed session. Jumping in puddles is way more fun with friends 🏃🏽‍♀️🏃🏽‍♀️🏃🏽‍♀️💨#bibchat #bibravepro #teamnuun #nuunlife #wvrc #northvancouver https://t.co/8w79zCDCoQ
@ErinTtweeting @TrainWithBain @VanessaJunkin @BibRave I should load up on bath bombs! #bibchat
RT @eaglecreekgear: @jeannineavelino @BrendaRuns @BibRave We have a few retail locations in Canada, check our retail locator on our site...…
@BibRave A6 Thankful for all the positive people in my life who lift my spirits up and keep me going. <3 #bibchat
@BibRave A5 Pushy people in the mall! Part of the reason why I try to shop online more often now #bibchat
@BrendaRuns @BibRave @eaglecreekgear Wish it wasn't so hard to find here in Canada... would love to check them out #bibchat
@BibRave A4 I would love some @eaglecreekgear stuff so I can use it while travelling and for hauling my running clothes to work. Other than that, shoes, shoes shoes! #bibchat

@BibRave A3 I thank @cuski78 for travelling great distances with me so I can run and also dealing with my whining when I'm sore from training :P But it's a give and take relationship, I support his crazy cyclocross ways too. #bibchat
@Lponti @tmurph135 @BibRave I loved that city too. Wish I stayed longer. #bibchat
@tmurph135 @BibRave It's so pretty! And you can take a day trip to Paris <3 #bibchat

@BibRave A2 I've only gone away once over holidays. I went to Brussels for Christmas with my boyfriend one year. That was excellent. So my advice is to go to Brussels LOL Seriously though... beer + chocolate + Christmas FTW #bibchat
@iRunOnBeer @daddydidyouwin @ckittiesprint @BibRave i'd definitely try it #bibchat
@iRunOnBeer @daddydidyouwin @ckittiesprint @BibRave With pineapple! That's interesting... #bibchat
